 2007-01822007-02-15341999,  ,  ND,  , 
ActPublic Sector Pension Investment Board Act
An Act to amend the Canadian Forces Superannuation Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts
SubjectBill C-78 (36th Parl, 3rd Session) and Bill C-37 (37th Parl., 2nd Session)
PrecisOrder fixing MARCH 1, 2007 as the day upon which the following provisions of certain statutes COME INTO FORCE, namely: . (a) section 154 of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board Act, being chapter 34 of the Statutes of Canada, 1999 [Bill C-78]; and (b) certain provisions of An Act to amend the Canadian Forces Superannuation Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts, being chapter 26 of the Statutes of Canada, 2003 [Bill C-37].
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2007-0021 Publication Date: 2007-03-07
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Public Sector Pension Investment Board ActAn Act to amend the Canadian Forces Superannuation Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts
subject: Bill C-78 (36th Parl, 3rd Session) and Bill C-37 (37th Parl., 2nd Session)
precis:
Order fixing MARCH 1, 2007 as the day upon which the following provisions of certain statutes COME INTO FORCE, namely:
.
  (a) section 154 of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board Act, being chapter 34 of the Statutes of Canada, 1999 [Bill C-78]; and
  (b) certain provisions of An Act to amend the Canadian Forces Superannuation Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts, being chapter 26 of the Statutes of Canada, 2003 [Bill C-37].
